title: What are some good songs to make a texting lyric prank? - Quora

response.answer_text: I actually write songs myself and here is one of my songs you should use Life is Crazy By: Hannah Mayer Verse: There are days when I tired And that is because I somehow wake up In the middle of the night And I don't know why I tend to wake up In the middle of the night Because there is really loud music That tends to bother me When I'm try to sleep Pre Chorus: But there are times When I don't want to wake up Because I feel like I didn't get enough sleep So people can drive me crazy Whenever I am really tired And somebody tries to me up In the middle of my sleep Especially guys who want love Because I am really popular And don't choose to have drugs Chorus: So this can be a part of my life And it really can drive me nuts By people playing loud music Very late at night And can barely sleep Because the music is loud So that's why life is crazy Crazy Crazy Crazy Verse: I went to a concert That had very loud music And I got to see Carrie Underwood Perform live on stage And after that I got to meet her And I start acting crazy In front of my siblings Because I finally meet Carrie Underwood Pre Chorus: But there are times When I don't want to wake up Because I feel like I didn't get enough sleep So people can drive me crazy Whenever I am really tired And somebody tries to me up In the middle of my sleep Especially guys who want love Because I am really popular And I don't choose to have drugs Chorus: So this can be a part of my life And it really can drive me nuts By people playing loud music Very late at night And can barely sleep Because the music is loud So that's why life is crazy Crazy Crazy Crazy Bridge: There are other things I've done Which includes riding the sky coaster And it was the craziest I've done Because I flying in the sky But I wasn't afraid And I was will to risk it Just like Elsa in frozen With her magical powers Freezing the summer Chorus: So this can be a part of my life And it really can drive me nuts By people playing loud music Very late at night And can barely sleep Because the music is loud So that's why life is crazy Crazy Crazy Crazy this song should definitely prank your best friends if you change some of the lyrics around

(Warning: Some if these songs may include foul language) Bad Blood by Taylor Swift (This song would put on a great show if you send it to a family member/friend who you recently got into a argument with; seeing someone trying to apologize numerous times is surprisingly very good content!) The "Friends" theme song (If a friend recently asked you for advice on anything life related, use this song!) Like I Would by Zayn (This one would be ideal for a friend or family member in a relationship!) No Scrubs by TLC Complicated by Avril Levigne Love Story by Taylor Swift Lose Yourself by Eminem Stressed Out by Twenty One Pilots At Night I Think Of You (My Boo) by Inoj feat. Ghost Town DJs Dueces by Chris Brown John Doe by B.O.B feat. Priscilla Comfortable by K Camp Difference by Ginuwine Don't Mind by Kent Jones One Last Time by Ariana Grande Every Little Step by Bobby Brown Pumped Up Kicks by Foster The People Keep Bleeding Leona Lewis I Hate You I Love You by Gnash feat. Olivia O Brien I Want It That Way by (The) Backstreet Boys Bye Bye Bye by NSYNC Just A Dream by Nelly Lost Boy by Ruth B 7 Years by Lukas Graham I Took A Pill In Ibiza by Mike Posner One Wish by Ray J Pocketful Of Sunshine by Natasha Beddingfield Right Hand by Drake Put Some Respeck On My Name Somebody That I Used To Know by Gotye Style by Taylor Swift
